authors.name: Ahmed Mourad
authors.bio: Egyptian novelist and screenwriter known for his thrilling crime and mystery novels.

authors.name: Nabil Farouk
authors.bio: Egyptian novelist and physician, best known for his Ragol Al Mostaheel spy series and science fiction works.

authors.name: Naguib Mahfouz
authors.bio: Nobel Prize-winning Egyptian writer regarded as one of the first contemporary writers of Arabic literature.

authors.name: Alaa Al Aswany
authors.bio: Egyptian writer and novelist known for his critical portrayals of contemporary Egyptian society.

authors.name: Youssef Ziedan
authors.bio: Egyptian scholar and novelist specializing in Arabic and Islamic studies.

authors.name: Ahmed Khaled Tawfik
authors.bio: Egyptian author and physician, pioneer of Arabic horror and science fiction writing.

authors.name: Mohamed Sadek
authors.bio: Egyptian novelist known for romantic and contemporary fiction, author of the bestselling novel Hepta.

authors.name: Agatha Christie
authors.bio: English writer known as the Queen of Mystery, creator of Hercule Poirot and Miss Marple.

authors.name: Stephen King
authors.bio: American author known as the King of Horror, master of suspense and supernatural fiction.

authors.name: Ihsan Abdel Quddous
authors.bio: Egyptian writer, novelist, and journalist known for his romantic novels and social commentary.

authors.name: J.K. Rowling
authors.bio: British author best known for the Harry Potter fantasy series, one of the best-selling book series in history.

authors.name: Dan Brown
authors.bio: American author of thriller novels, best known for The Da Vinci Code and Robert Langdon series.

authors.name: George R.R. Martin
authors.bio: American novelist and screenwriter, author of the epic fantasy series A Song of Ice and Fire.

books.title: Vertigo
books.description: A gripping psychological thriller about a photographer who witnesses a murder in a high-class Cairo nightclub.

books.title: Diamond Dust
books.description: A pharmacist's life changes dramatically after his father is murdered and he discovers his father's diary revealing dark secrets from the past.

books.title: The Blue Elephant
books.description: A psychiatrist is drawn into a dangerous mystery when he tries to treat a mysterious patient in a mental hospital.
Set during the 1919 Egyptian revolution, following a man searching for his missing brother.

books.title: The Land of God
books.description: A story set in Ancient Egypt between the era of the 18th dynasty and the time of Ptolemy II.

books.title: Locanda Bir Al-Watawit
books.description: A detective story featuring a paranoid detective investigating mysterious events.

books.title: Sphinx
books.description: A thrilling adventure set in 1869 featuring the same detective from Locanda Bir Al-Watawit.

books.title: The Mysterious Disappearance
books.description: First book in the Ragol Al Mostaheel series featuring Egyptian superspy Adham Sabri.

books.title: The Death Race
books.description: Adham Sabri faces a deadly race against time in this thrilling espionage adventure.

books.title: Malaf Al Mostakbal
books.description: The first book in The Future File series, exploring futuristic science fiction themes.

books.title: Bariq Al-Mas (Diamond Sparkle)
books.description: Adham Sabri embarks on a dangerous mission to uncover the secret behind a mysterious international diamond smuggling network.

books.title: Qenaa Al-Khatar (Mask of Danger)
books.description: A thrilling adventure where Adham Sabri faces a deadly masked assassin working for an unknown international organization.

books.title: Saed Al-Gawasies (The Spy Hunter)
books.description: Adham Sabri takes on one of his most challenging missions yet â€” tracking a rogue spy who threatens global security.

books.title: Palace Walk
books.description: First novel in the Cairo Trilogy, depicting a Cairo family's life in the 1920s.

books.title: Palace of Desire
books.description: The second volume of the Cairo Trilogy following the family through political upheaval.

books.title: Children of Gebelawi
books.description: An allegorical novel exploring themes of religion, science, and human nature through generations of one family.

books.title: The Yacoubian Building
books.description: A vivid portrait of modern Egyptian society through the residents of a Cairo apartment building.

books.title: Chicago
books.description: The lives of Egyptian expatriates in Chicago exploring identity and cultural conflict.

books.title: The Automobile Club of Egypt
books.description: Set in 1950s Cairo, exploring class struggles and the relationship between servants and aristocracy.

books.title: The Republic of False Truths
books.description: A novel set during the 2011 Egyptian revolution, examining the struggle between protesters and the regime.

books.title: The Trees Walk in Alexandria
books.description: Set in 1960s Alexandria, exploring the experiences of Europeans facing discrimination under military rule.

books.title: Azazeel
books.description: A historical novel set in 5th century Egypt exploring early Christianity and religious conflicts.

books.title: Guantanamo
books.description: A novel connecting ancient Egyptian wisdom with Renaissance Italy through a mysterious violin.

books.title: Utopia
books.description: A dystopian novel depicting a future Egypt divided between the ultra-rich and the impoverished.

books.title: Ma Waraa Al Tabiaa
books.description: The groundbreaking horror series that introduced supernatural fiction to Arab readers.

books.title: Safari
books.description: A science fiction series about time travel and adventure across different historical periods.

books.title: Taha Al-Gharib
books.description: Mohamed Sadek's first novel exploring contemporary Egyptian life.

books.title: A Few Hours in One Day
books.description: A contemporary novel exploring relationships and life in modern Egypt.

books.title: Hepta
books.description: A bestselling novel about the seven stages of love, adapted into a successful 2016 film.

books.title: Insta Life
books.description: A modern take on relationships and social media in contemporary Egyptian society.

books.title: El-Dama
books.description: A contemporary drama exploring complex human relationships.

books.title: Murder on the Orient Express
books.description: Detective Hercule Poirot investigates a murder aboard the famous Orient Express train.

books.title: And Then There Were None
books.description: Ten strangers are lured to an isolated island where they are accused of murder and killed one by one.

books.title: Death on the Nile
books.description: Hercule Poirot investigates a murder during a luxury cruise on the Nile River in Egypt.

books.title: The Shining
books.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil presence influences the father into violence.

books.title: It
books.description: A group of friends confront an ancient evil that preys on the children of their hometown.

books.title: The Stand
books.description: After a plague kills most of the world's population, the survivors face a battle between good and evil.

books.title: I Do Not Sleep
books.description: An epistolary novel exploring love, independence, and women's struggles in Egyptian society.

books.title: I Am Free
books.description: A groundbreaking novel about a young woman's journey to defy patriarchal authority.

books.title: A Nose and Three Eyes
books.description: A psychological exploration of relationships between men and women in conservative Egyptian society.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.description: A young wizard discovers his magical heritage and begins his education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
books.coverUrl: /images/Harry Potter and the Chamber of SecretsQL80_.jpg
books.description: Harry's second year at Hogwarts is marked by mysterious attacks and the legend of the Chamber of Secrets.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
books.coverUrl: /images/Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban_.jpg
books.description: Harry learns more about his past as an escaped prisoner threatens Hogwarts.

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.description: A symbologist uncovers a conspiracy involving the Catholic Church and the Holy Grail.

books.title: Angels and Demons
books.description: Robert Langdon races to prevent the destruction of Vatican City by an ancient secret society.

books.title: Inferno
books.description: Robert Langdon awakens in Italy with amnesia and must stop a deadly global plague.

books.title: A Game of Thrones
books.description: Noble families compete for control of the Iron Throne in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

books.title: A Clash of Kings
books.description: The War of the Five Kings rages as multiple claimants battle for the Iron Throne.

books.title: A Storm of Swords
books.description: The third book in A Song of Ice and Fire series, featuring the Red Wedding and other shocking events.
